GSD.description:
nvme-pci: fix a NULL pointer dereference in nvme_alloc_admin_tags

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 7a28556082d1fbcbc599baf1c24252dfc73efefc. For more details please see the references link.
